content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at position(x=-10.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position(x=-10.0, y=-50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position(x=-9.5, y=-48.5) which feeds the furnace
- Burner Inserter at position(x=-15.5, y=-53.5) connected to a transport belt line

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of the following belt groups:
- BeltGroup 1: Inputs from position(x=-16.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-54.5), Outputs from position(x=-12.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-10.5, y=-54.5)
- BeltGroup 2: Inputs from position(x=-14.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-50.5), Outputs from position(x=-16.5, y=-55.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-55.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors in connecting belts directly to a furnace
- Use an inserter to connect belts to a furnace instead of attempting direct connections

### Errors in connecting BeltGroups
- Ensure that BeltGroups are properly connected and paths are valid for normalization

### Errors in finding suitable positions for entities
- When placing entities like burner inserters, ensure there is a valid and unoccupied position available

### Insufficient fuel errors
- Regularly check and refuel entities to prevent them from running out of fuel and halting production
